comment.author: 24922012@N00
comment._content:
A pianist of Carols playing softly by a candles light
played among a hall of friend to each note that's within his sight 
from each key stroke a gentle echo is sent and is heard by all those gathered here 
by this moment caught some now gently sing and are joined by others near 
for who could not be of a mind to sing in a house filled with a musics calm
to pause then in an atmosphere of gentle light and in a carols enduring charm

Poem by Ironmonger
